scripts.dev: sh -c 'parcel watch index.html & nodemon -q -w dist -e html,js,css -x "npm run sync-docs"'
scripts.sync-docs: rm -rf ../../docs && cp -R dist ../../docs && sed -i '' 's|<script type="module" src="[^"]*"></script>|<script type="module" src="/die-roboter/die-roboter-example.8ed14f75.js"></script>|' ../../docs/index.html
